name: Agent Autumn - action endless runner
description:
P.s. Use fullscreen if want play in browser.

It endless runner in 2D. But i add slide mechanic. You play with agent Autumn who fights with bandits, and must dont die on the high speed. It only prototype and first game if you want continue, write. All what i make it make bugfixs

Control

W - jump,  S - slide
